sen.j: 石槍(いしやり)とは、打製石器の一種で、石で作った槍の頭の部分である。
sen.e: Ishiyari is a kind of chipped stone tool used as the spearhead.
Ishiyari is a kind of chipped stone tool used as the spearhead.
Ishiyari is a kind of chipped stone tool used as the spearhead.

sen.j: つるで作った紐で棒に結びつけて使用した。
sen.e: Ishiyari was used, tied to a stick with vine string.
Ishiyari was used, tied to a stick with a vine string.
Ishiyari was used, tied to a stick with a vine string.

sen.j: 主に、落とし穴に落ちた動物を刺し、とどめとしたものと思われる。
sen.e: It is thought to have been used mainly for stabbing and killing animals falling in a pitfall.
It is thought to have been used mainly for stabbing and killing animals fallen in a pitfall.
It is thought to have been used mainly for stabbing and killing animals fallen in a pitfall.
